item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @Jordonc2005 Jordonc2005
item.description:
@Jordonc2005 wrote:

if ur usin telescape source, replace your whole commandhandler.java with this

[code]import java.io.*;

public class CommandHandler {

public void customCommand(String command, int a) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[a];

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“refreshstats”)) {
for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) {
if(server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
client z = (client) server.playerHandler.players[i];
z.refreshSkills2();
for(int j = 0; j <= 20; j++) {
z.playerLevel[j] = z.getLevelForXP(z.playerXP[j]);
}
}
}
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Your stats have been refreshed.”;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“dummies”)) {
if(p.nonWild() == false)
{
p.sendMessage(“You cannot use this command in a PKZone.”);
}
else if(p.nonWild() == true)
{

		p.teleportToX = 3252;
	p.teleportToY = 3433;
	p.newheightLevel = 0;
	p.sendMessage("Welcome to the Training Area!");
}

}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“theive”)) {
if(p.nonWild() == false)
{
p.sendMessage(“You cannot use this command in a PKZone.”);
}
else if(p.nonWild() == true)
{

		p.teleportToX = 2517;
	p.teleportToY = 3359;
	p.newheightLevel = 0;
	p.sendMessage("Welcome to the Thieving Arena!");
}

}
else if (command.startsWith(“shop”)) {
if(p.nonWild() == false)
{
p.sendMessage(“You cannot use this command in a PKZone.”);
}
else if(p.nonWild() == true)
{
p.teleportToX = 2097;
p.teleportToY = 4428;
p.newheightLevel = 0;
p.sendMessage(“Welcome to TeleScape’s Shops! Everything you need right here!”);
}
}
else if (command.startsWith(“demote”) && p.playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int z = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[z];
c.playerRights = 0;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (""+command.substring(6)+" is now has been stripped of all their rights by “+p.playerName+”");
} catch(Exception e) {
p.sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“food”))
{
p.addItem(391, 28);
p.sendMessage(“You stock up your inventory with MonkFish.”);
}
else if (command.startsWith(“vent”) && p.playerRights >= 1 && (command.length() > 5)) {

for(int I = 0; I < server.npcHandler.npcs.length; I++)
{
	if (server.npcHandler.npcs[I] != null)
	{
		server.npcHandler.npcs[I].updateRequired = true;
		server.npcHandler.npcs[I].textUpdateRequired = true;
		server.npcHandler.npcs[I].textUpdate = command.substring(5);
	}
	else 
	{
	p.sendMessage("[ERROR] Cannot initialize command ::Vent");
	}
}

}
else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5)
{
String ytext = command.substring(5);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “”+p.playerName+": "+ytext;
}
/////////////////////END OF COMMAND VOID /////////////////////
}
/////////////////////END OF COMMAND HANDLER///////////////////
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @blakeblake blakeblake
item.description:
@blakeblake wrote:

Says I reached end of file without parsing, I looked all over, I got all of em done, unless im blind. Please just look at my whole commandhandler and tell me if its bad. import java.io.*;

public class CommandHandler {

public void customCommand(String command, int a) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[a];

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“refreshstats”)) {
for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) {
if(server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
client z = (client) server.playerHandler.players[i];
z.refreshSkills2();
for(int j = 0; j <= 20; j++) {
z.playerLevel[j] = z.getLevelForXP(z.playerXP[j]);
}
}
}
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Your stats have been refreshed.”;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“dummies”)) {
if(p.nonWild() == false)
{
p.sendMessage(“You cannot use this command in a PKZone.”);
}
else if(p.nonWild() == true)
{

		p.teleportToX = 3252;
	p.teleportToY = 3433;
	p.newheightLevel = 0;
	p.sendMessage("Welcome to the Training Area!");
}

}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“theive”)) {
if(p.nonWild() == false)
{
p.sendMessage(“You cannot use this command in a PKZone.”);
}
else if(p.nonWild() == true)
{

		p.teleportToX = 2517;
	p.teleportToY = 3359;
	p.newheightLevel = 0;
	p.sendMessage("Welcome to the Thieving Arena!");
}

}
else if (command.startsWith(“shop”)) {
if(p.nonWild() == false)
{
p.sendMessage(“You cannot use this command in a PKZone.”);
}
else if(p.nonWild() == true)
{
p.teleportToX = 2097;
p.teleportToY = 4428;
p.newheightLevel = 0;
p.sendMessage(“Welcome to BlakeScape’s Shops! Everything you need right here!”);
}
}
else if (command.startsWith(“demote”) && p.playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int z = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[z];
c.playerRights = 0;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (""+command.substring(6)+" is now has been stripped of all their rights by “+p.playerName+”");
} catch(Exception e) {
p.sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“food”))
{
p.addItem(391, 28);
p.sendMessage(“You stock up your inventory with MonkFish.”);
}
else if (command.startsWith(“vent”) && p.playerRights >= 1 && (command.length() > 5)) {

for(int I = 0; I < server.npcHandler.npcs.length; I++)
{
	if (server.npcHandler.npcs[I] != null)
	{
		server.npcHandler.npcs[I].updateRequired = true;
		server.npcHandler.npcs[I].textUpdateRequired = true;
		server.npcHandler.npcs[I].textUpdate = command.substring(5);
	}
	else 
	{
	p.sendMessage("[ERROR] Cannot initialize command ::Vent");
}

if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {

String ytext = command.substring(5);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ""+p.playerName+": "+ytext;
}

/////////////////////END OF COMMAND VOID /////////////////////
}
/////////////////////END OF COMMAND HANDLER///////////////////
}

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @blakeblake blakeblake
item.description:
@blakeblake wrote:

[code]Please do not flame me, I thought this is perfect, but I’m getting error when i compile this…

else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {

String ytext = command.substring(5);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ""+p.playerName+": "+ytext;
}

if you see anything wrong with that, please let me know, again i feel so dumb its such an easy fix but idk whats wrong with it…

./Java/CommandHandler.Java:94: ‘else’ without ‘if’
else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5)
^ [/code]

Read full topic
